reviewText: So witty. The jingles are catchy and the math concepts advanced. The main character girl is always freaking out. But we watch it for the witty banter and the funny Cat and the dance steps. And the catchy music--did I mention the jingles??
Peg covers some concepts that are overlooked in some of the other educational videos while encouraging acceptance of things that are different from what we normally prefer.
My three year old son loves Peg + Cat!
My toddler loves this DVD. No problems with it. Thank you!
I love it! Therefore I bought it for a friend's 4 year old. Then I binge watched it on Amazon Prime.
